oracle.kv.table

Interface JsonDef

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FieldDef

    public interface JsonDef
extends FieldDef
    JsonDef is an extension of FieldDef to define schemaless data modeled as JSON. A field defined as JsonDef can contain MapOfAnyValue, ArrayOfAnyValue, or any of the atomic types.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface oracle.kv.table.FieldDef

        FieldDef.Type
